short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to input KU PT allocations in a batch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool intended for staff members at Kingston University to help alleviate some data-entry drudgery in a very specific context within this specific institution.

If you know what this extension is for, have at it. Otherwise, it is of absolutely no use to anyone else!
